text.emotional: [happiness, medium]He built a massive wooden pier in Ravenport, a new hanging bridge in Hagenstedt, and his current masterpiece, a wooden roller coaster in Silverrun Forest.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} he built a massive wooden pier in ravenport {....} a new hanging bridge in hagenstedt {....} and his current masterpiece {...} a wooden roller coaster in silverrun forest {..}
